name: MLNDR Family Props: 002/Lighter
description: The MLNDR Family Props collection will be comprised of 50 Objekts that I will use in scenes from the MLNDR Family Series to be developed in the next few months. Set in a dystopian future where natural resources are scarce and pollution is a global problem, the MLNDR Family Collection will portray how I see our future as a species if our hunger for non-renewable natural resources continues to grow. This lighter was dropped as my contribution to the first 100 days of HEN
